mapper.select:
select name, GROUP_CONCAT(vv.data ORDER BY vv.data asc ) as time, GROUP_CONCAT((case when invstAmount is null then 0 ELSE invstAmount end) ORDER BY vv.data asc ) as investedAmount, GROUP_CONCAT((case when eventNum is null then 0 ELSE eventNum end) ORDER by vv.data asc ) as investedNum from (select id,name FROM app_industry where parentId = #{industryId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )as aa join (select data from app_dim_date where
type ='M' and DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{time} month),'%Y-%m') < data and data <= date_format(curdate(),'%Y-%m')
type ='Q' and substring_index(data,'Q',1) > DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL #{time} YEAR), '%Y') and data <= date_format(curdate(),'%Y-%m')
type ='Y' and data > DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL #{time} YEAR), '%Y') and data <= date_format(curdate(),'%Y-%m')
order by data) as vv left join ( select timDim,industryId,industrySubId, sum(invstAmount) as invstAmount, sum(eventNum) as eventNum from app_industry_groupround_district
and timeType ='M' and timDim>DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval #{time} month),'%Y-%m')
and timeType ='Q' and substring_index(timDim,'Q',1) > DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL #{time} YEAR), '%Y')
and timeType ='Y' and timDim > DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL #{time} YEAR), '%Y')
and districtSubId=#{districtSubId}
and industryRoundId=#{industryRoundId}
and industryType=#{industryId} + 1
group by industryId,timDim
group by industrySubId,timDim
)as bb
on aa.id = bb.industryId and vv.data = bb.timDim
on aa.id = bb.industrySubId and vv.data = bb.timDim
group by aa.id order by aa.id

SELECT b.roundName, GROUP_CONCAT((case when invstAmount is null then 0 ELSE invstAmount end) ORDER BY a.id asc ) as investedAmountStr, GROUP_CONCAT(name ORDER BY a.id asc ) as industryNameStr, GROUP_CONCAT((case when eventNum is null then 0 ELSE eventNum end) ORDER BY a.id asc ) as investedNumStr from (SELECT id ,name FROM app_industry where parentId= #{industryId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) as a join (select id as roundId, round_name as roundName from app_industry_round) as b left join ( select industryId, industrySubId,industryRoundId,industryRoundName, if(sum(invstAmount) is null,0,sum(invstAmount)) as invstAmount , if(sum(eventNum) is null,0,sum(eventNum)) as eventNum from app_industry_groupround_district
and timeType= 'D' and timDim>DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval #{time} day),'%Y-%m')
and timeType= 'M' and timDim>DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval #{time} month),'%Y-%m')
and timeType ='Y' and timDim > DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL #{time} YEAR), '%Y')
and districtSubId=#{districtSubId}
and industryType=#{industryId} + 1
group by industryId,industryRoundId
group by industrySubId,industryRoundId
) as d
on a.id = d.industryId and b.roundId = d.industryRoundId
on a.id = d.industrySubId and b.roundId = d.industryRoundId
group by b.roundId ORDER BY b.roundId asc

select industryId,industryName,districtSubName,sum(eventNum) as eventNum , 0 as parentId from app_industry_groupround_district
and timeType= 'D' and timDim>DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval #{time} day),'%Y-%m')
and timeType= 'M' and timDim>DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval #{time} month),'%Y-%m')
and timeType ='Y' and timDim > DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL #{time} YEAR), '%Y')
and districtSubId=#{districtSubId}
and industryId=#{industryId}
and industryType =1
group by industryId union all select industrySubId as industryId, industrySubName as industryName,districtSubName,sum(eventNum) as eventNum ,industryId as parentId from app_industry_groupround_district
and timeType= 'D' and timDim>DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval #{time} day),'%Y-%m')
and timeType= 'M' and timDim>DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval #{time} month),'%Y-%m')
and timeType ='Y' and timDim > DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL #{time} YEAR), '%Y')
and districtSubId=#{districtSubId}
and industryId=#{industryId}
and industryType =2
group by industrySubId
